descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains a list of video games. A scrape of vgchartz.com generated it. 
Fields include

- Rank - Ranking of overall sales
- Name - The games name
- Platform - Platform of the game's release (i.e. PC,PPS4, etc.)
- Year - Year of the game's release
- Genre - Genre of the game
- Developer - Developer of Game.
- Publisher - Publisher of the game
- NA_Sales - Sales in North America (in millions)
- PAL_Sales - Sales in PAL region(in millions)
- JP_Sales - Sales in Japan (in millions)
- Other_Sales - Sales in the rest of the world (in millions)
- Global_Sales - Total worldwide sales.

Credit: GREGORY SMITH. You can check out his dataset [here](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/gregorut/videogamesales) Code for scraping is also available at his [github](https://github.com/GregorUT/vgchartzScrape)
title: Video Game Sales
subtitle: Video Game Sales in millions
